English: <glee>þI'll tell you what, I’m so glad you’ve decided to accompany me on this adventure, <PlayerName>.
<worried>þI was starting to think no one in <SouthCity> was brave enough to join me!
<haha>When you were the first and only person to respond to my ad, I knew you were the right person for the job!
<no>Oh dear, look at old <myName> waffle on...
